laboratory_examinations.findings: Multiple diverticula within the sigmoid colon; 9 cm inflamed segment of sigmoid colon with marked wall edema thickening and pericolonic fat stranding. Air and fluid collection just anterior to sigmoid colon decreased in size from 5 x 3 cm to 3 x 1.9 cm. Two small fluid collections within the wall of the sigmoid colon likely representing intramural abscess. Small amount of free fluid within the pelvis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The air and fluid collection decreased in size from 5 x 3 cm to 3 x 1.9 cm, suggesting communication with the bowel and auto-decompression.
